quotes.quote: I love the rain. It's me fav'rit weather.
quotes.author: Kristen Wig

quotes.quote: If ye wants t' see the sunshine, ye 'ave t' weather the storm.
quotes.author: Frank Lane

quotes.quote: Everybody natters about the weather, but nobody does anythin' about it.
quotes.author: Charlie Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Wherever ye go, no matter wha' the weather, always bring yer owns sunshine.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Sunshine be delicious, rain be refreshin', wind braces us up, snow be exhilaratin'; thar be mighty no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds o' good weather.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Bad weather always looks worse through a window.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: The autumn wind be a pirate. Blusterin' in from sea wit' a rollickin' chanty he sweeps along swaggerin' boisterously. His face be weather beaten, he wears a hooded sash wit' a silver hat about his head... The autumn wind be a Raider, pillagin' jus' fer fun.
quotes.author: Steve Sabol

quotes.quote: A friendship can weather most things 'n thrive in thin soil; but it needs a wee mulch o' letters 'n phone calls 'n wee, silly presents every so often - jus' t' save it from drying out completely.
quotes.author: Pam Brown
